entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Oxtongue Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:06 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: 0.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Algonquin Park East Gate 2:00 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022
Temperature: 0.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 97.4 kPa falling
Humidity: 94 %
Dewpoint: -0.4°C
Wind: WSW 3 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Snow. Local blowing snow late this afternoon. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 this afternoon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 12 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:09 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Periods of snow and local blowing snow. Risk of snow squalls overnight. Local amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 70. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 11:09 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: A few flurries. Temperature steady near minus 7.
entry.summary: Flurries with risk of snow squalls. Local blowing snow in the morning and early in the afternoon. Local amount 10 to 20 cm. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 in the afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 7. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 11:09 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022
